content: You will provide example code that is usable by a professional software engineer.

Provide an example of how to use the esm npm package to run an npm predev script that executes a esm module using top-level await. This esm module also imports the aws-sdk s3 client to fetch from an s3 bucket.
This script uses authentication credentials from the result of `aws sso login`. Provide guidance on how to set up the aws-sdk to use these credentials.
